Imagery Description: (a) Two draped women—1. almost completely gone, right with cloak drawn up over her head, like a mime dancer (cf. Taranto 20406; RVAp I, p. 179), (b) seated woman on klismos tol. Shoulder: (a) plastid female heads, (b) conical knobs. For the shape cf. the Koutoulakis stamnoid lebes (no. 187). Triangular ornaments in the field.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
